attributes.review: This is a very scary experience that gives me trauma to write out but this app MUST be taken down. I installed the app because Iâ€™m deeply in love with Donald J Trump. Once I get it it takes me to login in and of course I do so but then out of nowhere I heard a voice coming from my phone. It looked like someone was looking at me through the camera and I heard them say â€œOh god! Not a colored personâ€. I gasped as I realize the voice was no others then Mr.Trumps. He continues saying â€œI donâ€™t want no negro on my app, I donâ€™t want no negro on this Earthâ€ and proceeds to come up my house. He tried running up to me but his fat chubby legs made him wobble instead. He then yelled â€œNEGRO NEGROâ€ and tried to shoot me with his very expensive gun. I quickly ran inside but sadly he shot my goldfish who was the same color as him. I tried to call the police but realized theyâ€™d shoot me on spot because Iâ€™m black so I resorted to the firefighters. Iâ€™m all good now but if you are black DO NOT GET THIS APP PLEASE!
